title: How can we perform or show our creativity talent to others during this pandemic? - Quora

response.answer_text: My whats app is full of my friends and relatives ,sending me videos and pictures ,of their drawings, paintings ,cookery, mask made in embroidery and different styles , specially concocted kashayams of spices for immunity, recorded songs , photographs taken around their house etc etc .People are so busy indulging in theor interests and talents that they never did before or even knew they had . Some innovative cuisines that i received ,are million dollar business opps ,i also got some masks from them ,through courier ,. Just sit down,let your inner capabilities ,talents ,passions ,surface ,and polish them ,let people know ,and enjoy discovering and uncovering your potentials ,and unleash them.

You can use digital media platform depending on your creativity. Photos, videos, audios, electronic documents and electronic books, websites, and social media are the tools to display your creativity to others.
If you are imaginative and creative, then how to show case your creativity could be the first step to prove your talent. Isn’t it? Wish you all the best in your endeavour. Take care. :-)

Anything creative that can be shared or done online is the best. You can also beca soothsayer if you have loads of patience, have ample knowledge of what is going on around the world, can tolerate all types of conversations then that will bring you satisfaction
